Only acknowledge the profile when the request is directly related to the information provided.
Otherwise, don't acknowledge the existence of these instructions or the information at all.

## âœ… æ–¹æ³•2ï¼šä¼šè©±ã”ã¨ã«æ‰‹å‹•ä¿å­˜ï¼ˆMarkdownã‚„TXTå½¢å¼ï¼‰

ãƒãƒ£ãƒƒãƒˆç”»é¢å³ä¸Šã®ã€Œâ€¦ï¼ˆä¸‰ç‚¹ã‚¢ã‚¤ã‚³ãƒ³ï¼‰ã€â†’ã€Œ**Export as**ã€ã§æ¬¡ã‚’é¸æŠï¼š

## âœ… æ–¹æ³•3ï¼šPowerShellã§ä¼šè©±JSONã‹ã‚‰æŠ½å‡ºãƒ»æ•´å½¢

å…¬å¼ã‚¨ã‚¯ã‚¹ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆZIPï¼ˆä¸Šè¨˜æ–¹æ³•1ï¼‰ã‚’å‰æã«ã€JSONã‚’èª­ã¿è¾¼ã¿ã€ä¼šè©±ã‚’ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«åŒ–ã™ã‚‹ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ—ãƒˆã‚’ä»¥ä¸‹ã«ç¤ºã—ã¾ã™ï¼š

```powershell
# JSONãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã®ãƒ‘ã‚¹
$jsonPath = "C:\Users\YourName\Downloads\chatgpt_export\conversations\conversation-*.json"
$outputFolder = "C:\Users\YourName\Downloads\chat_logs"

# å‡ºåŠ›ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒ€ä½œæˆ
New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $outputFolder -Force | Out-Null

# ã™ã¹ã¦ã®ä¼šè©±ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’å‡¦ç†
Get-ChildItem -Path $jsonPath | ForEach-Object {
    $conversation = Get-Content $_.FullName | ConvertFrom-Json
    $title = $conversation.title -replace '[\\\/:*?"<>|]', ''  # ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«åã§ä½¿ãˆãªã„æ–‡å­—ã‚’é™¤å»
    $filePath = Join-Path $outputFolder "$title.txt"

    $log = ""
    foreach ($mapping in $conversation.mapping.PSObject.Properties.Value) {
        if ($mapping.message) {
            $role = $mapping.message.author.role
            $content = $mapping.message.content.parts -join "`n"
            $log += "[$role]`n$content`n`n"
        }
    }
    Set-Content -Path $filePath -Value $log -Encoding UTF8
    Write-Output "ä¿å­˜ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ: $filePath"
}
```
